definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: Cheating on the diet—such as eating a candy bar—can bring on a seizure in minutes.
sentences.chinese: 在飲食上作弊，比如喫塊方糖，會馬上引起癲癇發作。

sentences.english: He bought a jin of cube sugar yesterday.
He spooned up several cakes of cube sugar and stuffed them into his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 他舀起了幾塊方糖，然後把它們全都塞進了嘴裏。

sentences.english: I've got some coffee. Please get me some cube sugar.
sentences.chinese: 我本身有咖啡，請拿幾塊方糖來。

sentences.english: Often hams will be added to improve taste and sugar candy added to gain
sentences.chinese: 通常會加入火腿和方糖來改善菜餚的味道。

sentences.english: There is as much sugar in it as eight pieces of sugar.
sentences.chinese: 其中的含糖量相當於八塊方糖。

sentences.english: Hidden under the straw was a little pile of lump sugar and several bunches of ribbon of different colours.
sentences.chinese: 草下竟藏着一堆方糖和幾條不同顏色的飾帶。

definition: Baileys Irish Cream (brand of alcoholic drink)
Baileys Irish Cream (brand of alcoholic drink)/see also 百利甜酒[Bai3 li4 Tian2 jiu3]
pearl milk tea/tapioca milk tea/bubble milk tea
